results.description: Bayern Munich missed the chance to clinch the Bundesliga title after drawing with RB Leipzig.
results.shortTitle: Bayern Munich miss chance to seal Bundesliga title
results.title: Bundesliga live - Bayern Munich miss chance to seal title

results.description: Kingsley Coman scores twice as Bayern Munich beat Fortuna Dusseldorf to go top of the Bundesliga.
results.shortTitle: Coman sends Bayern back to top of table
results.title: Fortuna Dusseldorf 1-4 Bayern Munich: Kingsley Coman sends champions top

results.description: Brighton defender Markus Suttner joins German club Fortuna Dusseldorf on loan until the end of the season.
results.title: Markus Suttner: Brighton defender joins German club Fortuna Dusseldorf on loan

results.description: Borussia Dortmund's unbeaten start to the Bundesliga season is over after the league leaders lose to Fortuna Dusseldorf
results.title: Fortuna Dusseldorf 2-1 Borussia Dortmund: leaders suffer first defeat

thumbnail.altText: Borussia Dortmund"s Marco Reus and Mario Gotze

results.description: Dodi Lukebakio's hat-trick increases the pressure on Bayern Munich boss Niko Kovac as lowly Fortuna Dusseldorf earn a surprise draw.
results.title: Bayern Munich 3-3 Fortuna Dusseldorf: Dodi Lukebakio's hat-trick stuns champions

results.description: Luka Jovic becomes the youngest player to score five goals in a Bundesliga game as Eintracht Frankfurt thrashed Fortuna Dusseldorf.
results.shortTitle: Jovic scores five goals in Bundesliga rout
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 7-1 Fortuna Dusseldorf: Luka Jovic scores five goals in Bundesliga rout

results.description: English teenager Reiss Nelson, on loan from Arsenal, scores on his Bundesliga debut but his Hoffenheim side lose.
results.title: Fortuna Dusseldorf 2-1 Hoffenheim: Reiss Nelson scores with first shot in Bundesliga
